definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: The measurement of the mechanical property of the materials used in hydraulic models is discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論了水工模型材料力學性質的量測問題。

sentences.english: The metric is a value that measures the desirability of a route.
sentences.chinese: 權值是量測一個路由的可取性的值。

sentences.english: Various methods measuring canine femoral neck anteversion have been proposed in literatures.
sentences.chinese: 過去的文獻中有許多量測股骨前傾角的方法。

sentences.english: Using the ASTM indicators, measure the thickness of both lites of glass in the IG assembly.
sentences.chinese: 使用ASTM指示時，量測雙面復層玻璃的厚度。

sentences.english: The sundial's nocturnal counterpart, the water clock, was designed to measure temporal hours at night.
sentences.chinese: 到了晚上，則用水鍾取代日晷，量測晚上的真時。

sentences.english: HASI will make similar measurements using radar signals.
sentences.chinese: HASI也會運用雷達訊號進行類似的量測。

sentences.english: The large scale air photos showed a bright practical prospect.
sentences.chinese: 展示了用大比例尺航片量測的實用前景。

sentences.english: GLAST's data will mesh neatly with those of contemporaneous particle physics measurements.
sentences.chinese: GLAST的數據將密切配合同時期粒子物理的量測。

sentences.english: The organization shall identify the HSF product status with respect to monitoring and measurement requirements.
sentences.chinese: 組織應根據監督與量測要求，識別HSF產品狀態。

sentences.english: Monitoring and measurement are necessary procedures in the design and construction of tunnel when using new Austrian tunneling method(NATM).
sentences.chinese: 監控量測是隧道新奧法設計與施工中必不可少的環節。

sentences.english: Solder side is chosen to measure.
sentences.chinese: 量測以喫錫面爲選擇點。

sentences.english: The present results have demonstrated that PRN also plays an inhibitory role in a variety of behavioral functions.
sentences.chinese: 目前實驗結果證實其對多種行爲量測也有抑制的作用。

sentences.english: So tunnel monitoring measurment is the foundation and prerequisite of tunneling with NATM in.
sentences.chinese: 因此，隧道監控量測是新奧法隧道施工的基礎和前提。
